channel.title: Gamedev on David Raab
channel.description: Recent content in Gamedev on David Raab

item.title: GameDev: Implementing a Hash like structure
item.description: What Is Recently I implemented my own data-structure to optimize the storage of my components in a game. Okay its more an architecture i am exploring not a real game at the moment. I just try to render and move as many things as possible while i try to keep frames per second as high as possible. For example rendering 10,000 boxes let them move in random directions, and change direction every second to a new random direction runs at 600 fps.
